reviews.review: 游戏是好游戏……但是我晕3D啊！呕……
Kafa yorucu bölümler ve uzun bir hikaye... Bir puzzle oyunundan daha ne istenilebilir ki.
Que jogo lindo.. nunca me canso de jogar esse jogo...
Dis is guud game. Mind twisting; time waster.
I hope one day I'll be working for Aperture.

Steam summer sale wants me to do this. 

It's a great game and only $2 atm. No reason to not get it.
Son zamanlarda oynadığım en güzel oyun. Kaliteli hikaye,kaliteli karakter ve dahası. İndirimdeyken kaçırmamak gerek.
Хорошая головоломка, я чуть бошку не взорвал

Tek kelimeyle müthiş bir hikayesi vardı. Bazen güldüren bazen üzdüren bazende düşündüren bir oyun. Grafikleri olsun mantığı olsun hikayesi olsun hepsi müthişti. 3 saatlik bir oynanışı vardı fakat ben ilk defa girdiğimde bile oyunda 6 saat geçirdim. Alırsanız pişman olmazsınız.
El mejor juego de puzzles y aventura que me ha dado ilusión al jugar y más si juegas con un amigo en coop. Diversion forever.
One of the best Valves games
J'aime bien, mieux vaut tard que jamais pour y jouer.
Juste incroyablement bien et drôle à deux, de plus du fait que le concept est très bon.
great game love the story mode didn't try the online mode great for weak computers awesome graphics
Portal 2 is the best game I've played, use your brain and don't watch the answers from youtube, etc. The sense of achievement will be huge after a hard stage has been solved.

Bulmaca tarzı oyun sevenler için mükemmel bir oyun.Özellikle oyun içindeki hikaye çok güzel olmuş bana göre. Aldığınız gün oyun size kendisini sevdiriyor. Ben çok beğendim. Umarım siz de beğenirsiniz.

Ich kenne Portal und Portal 2 schon seit ein paar Jahren,habe mich aber bisher noch nie durchgerungen die beiden Spiele für 30€ zu kaufen. Jetzt im Summersale 2017 gab es beide Spiele für 3€ und was soll ich sagen, diese 3€ waren wohl die beste Spieleinvestition aller Zeiten, auch wenn es euch am Anfang nicht so reizt, kauft es euch, am besten das Portal Bundle falls ihr den ersten Teil noch nicht gespielt habt.
Ihr werdet die 3€ definitiv nicht bereuen

Achja hier noch mein Score: 90/100
мне не очень интересна эта игра

The puzzle design ranges from flat out boring to intricate, which makes you feel either super smart or stupid.
Single player is decent, however the coop is the main selling point for me personally.
The games graphics and feel have aged very well, keeping up with today's standard.
User creation allows for a near infinite amount of replayabillity.
Don't think. PLAY. This is one of the best games that I've played
Watashi wa kono gēmu ga daisuki
这款游戏怎么说呢，虽然原理简单，就两个门，穿来穿去，但是又考虑到重力，速度之类的，一直玩下去就会体现到其魅力所在，推荐入手
Awesome Puzzle game with an interesting story
Great game, a good communication builder

Me deixa enjoado. Joguei o portal 1 direto até zerar, tive que deitar depois. MAS não parei antes de acabar =D
Vale a pena, ainda mais com esse desconto de 90%.
Is it weird that I cried a little at the end?

在游戏中，只要切换到其他窗口，就会导致鼠标失效，游戏想关都关不了
切任务管理器出来看不见鼠标，alt+f4也没有用

WOOOOOOOW, EL MEJOR JUEGO DE VALVE, CON DIFERENCIA.

Historia 10/10, puzles 10/10, graficos, audio, musica, etc 10/10.

Increible... saber que el universo de Half Life y Portal 2 estan totalmente relaccionados...

El peor villan@ de todos los juegos jamas vistos, el final mas epico y totalmente menos esperado de todos los juegos del mundo...  ENSERIO, MERECE LA PENA GASTAR DINERO PARA ADQUIRIR ESTE JUEGO. COMPRALO
Do you realy need to read the reviews? buy this game already, it's great!
难度高，可玩性高，很好玩！！非常推荐！！！
Ti fa sentire in qualche modo intelligente
能玩到这种神作，实乃游戏人生一大幸运。

J'ai joué à Portal 1 et 2 assez récemment mais woah quelle claque ! Tout simplement un must have (profitez des promos !) GlaDOS, Weathley, Malgré que vous soyez tout deux d'énormes psychopates... j'vous aime <3
很有趣的解謎遊戲，只不過我玩久了因為視角變換過大有點暈......

Accest joc are o poveste oleaca mai intertesanta decat jocul precedent.
GlaDOS a reinviat ca sa va faca niste teste.
Great story and is a good part two for the Original!!
Народ, куда обращаться при переломе головного мозга? Очень нужно...
Un gioco fantastico che consiglio a tutti, un gioco da non perdere assolutamente!
Uno dei migliori giochi della storia dei videogames
you have no idea , me too
Можно повеселится с друзьями , но быстро надоедает
之前玩的盗版，补票买的，一二两部一起买其实是6块钱，2部有双人模式，和基友或者男女朋友一起玩很不错，还有大量的创意工坊
Игра норм, особенно для игры с друзьями
纪念通关，断断续续玩了这么久，终于把剧情通关了。关卡既不是很难也不是秒解，难度适中。双人模式也很有趣脑洞大开的游戏，预防老年痴呆有奇效。
需要思考但也并不会很难，很适合双人玩的游戏。单人模式比较晕，但可玩性依然不错。
以前玩的是盗版，单人模式都不知道通关几遍了，现在过来强力推荐！！看什么！买啊！这么好玩的游戏！来了就是想要！犹豫就是想买！
